text: Flee for safety, \add O\add* children of Benjamin,
from the midst of Jerusalem.
And in Tekoa blow a horn,
and on Beth-haccherem lift up a signal,
for evil looks down from \add the\add* north,
and a great destruction.
The lovely and the delicate,
the daughter of Jerusalem, I will destroy.
Shepherds and their flocks will come against her,
they will pitch \add their\add* tents against her all around,
they will pasture, each his ⸤portion⸥.\f + \fr 6:3 \ft Literally “hand” \f*
⸤Sanctify⸥\f + \fr 6:4 \ft Or “Consecrate” \f* war against her.
Arise, and let us attack at noon.
Woe to us, for the day turns,
for \add the\add* shadows of evening are lengthened.
Arise, and let us attack by night,
and let us destroy her citadel fortresses.”
For thus says Yahweh of hosts,
“Cut down trees and heap up a siege ramp against Jerusalem.
This \add is\add* the city that must be punished,
its oppression \add is\add* in its midst.
As a water well keeps its water cool,
so she keeps cool her wickedness.
Violence and destruction are heard within her,
sickness and wounds\f + \fr 6:7 \ft Hebrew “wound” \f* \add are\add* continually ⸤before me⸥.\f + \fr 6:7 \ft Literally “at the face of me” \f*
Be warned, \add O\add* Jerusalem,
lest I turn away from you in disgust,
lest I make you a desolation,
a land that is not inhabited.”
Thus says Yahweh of hosts:
“They will thoroughly glean the remnant of Israel as a vine,
turn back your hand over \add the\add* branches like a grape-gatherer.
To whom shall I speak and admonish,
that they may hear?
Look, their ears \add are\add* ⸤closed⸥,\f + \fr 6:10 \ft Literally “uncircumcised” \f*
and they are not able to listen attentively.
Look, the word of Yahweh is to them an object of scorn,
they do not delight in it.
But I am full with the wrath of Yahweh,
I struggle to hold \add it\add*\f + \fr 6:11 \ft Here the direct object is supplied from context in the English translation \f* in.
Pour \add it\add* out on \add the\add* children\f + \fr 6:11 \ft Hebrew “child” \f* in the street,
and on the assemblies\f + \fr 6:11 \ft Hebrew “assembly” \f* of young men at the same time.
For even husband with wife will get trapped,
\add the\add* old with \add him who is\add* full of days.
And their houses will be turned over to others,
\add their\add* fields and \add their\add* wives together.
For I will stretch out my hand
against the inhabitants of the land,” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 6:12 \ft Literally “a declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
“For from the smallest of them to the greatest of them,
⸤everyone⸥\f + \fr 6:13 \ft Literally “all of him” \f* makes profit for unlawful gain.
And from the prophet to the priest,
⸤everyone⸥\f + \fr 6:13 \ft Literally “all of him” \f* practices deceit.
And they have treated the wound of my people lightly,
⸤saying⸥,\f + \fr 6:14 \ft Literally “to say” \f* ‘Peace, peace,’ but there is no peace.
Have they acted ashamed, for they have committed a detestable thing?
Not at all, nor were they ashamed; they did not know to feel humiliated.
⸤Therefore⸥\f + \fr 6:15 \ft Literally “To thus” \f* they will fall among \add those who\add* fall at the time I punish them,
they will stumble,” says Yahweh.
Thus says Yahweh: “Stand at \add the\add* roads and look,
and ask for \add the\add* ancient paths, where the way of the good \add is\add*,
and walk in it, and find rest for your inner selves.\f + \fr 6:16 \ft Hebrew “inner self” \f*
But they said, ‘We will not walk \add in it\add*.’\f + \fr 6:16 \ft Here the direct object is supplied from context in the English translation \f*
And I raised up watchmen over you:
‘Listen attentively to \add the\add* sound of a horn.’
But they said, ‘We will not listen attentively.’
⸤Therefore⸥\f + \fr 6:18 \ft Literally “To thus” \f* hear, O nations, and know, \add O\add* community,
⸤what will happen to them⸥.\f + \fr 6:18 \ft Literally “what among them” \f*
Hear, O earth,
look, I \add am\add* about to bring disaster to this people,
the fruit of their plans,
because they have not listened attentively to my words,
and my teaching, they have rejected it also.
What \add is\add* this to me?
Frankincense comes from Sheba,
and the precious spice reed from a distant land.
Your burnt offerings \add are\add* not ⸤acceptable⸥,\f + \fr 6:20 \ft Literally “for acceptance” \f*
your sacrifices are not pleasing to me.”
⸤Therefore⸥\f + \fr 6:21 \ft Literally “To thus” \f* thus says Yahweh:
“Look, I \add am\add* about to put before this people stumbling blocks,
and they will stumble against them,
fathers and children together,
neighbor and his friend will perish.”
Thus says Yahweh:
“Look, a people \add is\add* coming from \add the\add* land of \add the\add* north,
a great nation is woken up from \add the\add* farthest part of \add the\add* earth.
\add The\add* bow and \add the\add* short sword they grasp \add are\add* cruel,
and they show no mercy.
Their sound roars like the sea, and on horses they ride,
drawn up like a man for battle against you, O daughter of Zion.”
We have heard news of it,
our hands grow slack,
anxiety has grasped us,
pain as a \add woman who\add* gives birth.
You must not go out \add into\add* the field,
and you must not walk on the road,
for ⸤the enemy has a sword⸥,\f + \fr 6:25 \ft Literally “a sword for enemy” \f*
terror \add is\add* all around.
O daughter of my people,
gird yourself \add with\add* sackcloth,
and roll about in the ashes in mourning,
a mourning ceremony \add as for\add* an only child.
Make for yourself wailing of bitterness,
for suddenly the destroyer will come upon us.
“I have made you an assayer among my people, a fortification,
so that you may know and put to the test their ways.\f + \fr 6:27 \ft Hebrew “way” \f*
All of them \add are\add* stubborn rebels,
going about \add talking\add* slander.
\add They are\add* bronze and iron,
they \add are\add* all behaving corruptly.
\add The\add* bellows\f + \fr 6:29 \ft Hebrew “bellow” \f* are burned up,
lead is consumed by fire.
⸤In vain⸥\f + \fr 6:29 \ft Literally “To the vanity” \f* ⸤he keeps on refining⸥,\f + \fr 6:29 \ft Literally “he refines refining” \f*
but \add the\add* wicked are not torn apart.
⸤They are called⸥\f + \fr 6:30 \ft Literally “They call to them” \f* rejected silver,
For Yahweh has rejected them.”
